description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows MSHTML platform spoofing vulnerability (CVE-2024-43573):

1. Download the latest update package relevant to your operating system version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the update using the standard procedures for your Windows version.
3. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates include KB5044284, KB5044285, KB5044280, and KB5044273, which address the spoofing vulnerability specifically affecting Windows 11 and Windows 10 environments.
- Update packages can be found at the following links:
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible Windows version (Windows 11 or Windows 10).
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of updates.
